trans-unit.source: Supports the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> control and provides an interface for data-bound controls to perform data retrieval using Structured Query Language (SQL) against a Microsoft Access database.
trans-unit.target: Støtter den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> kontrollere og gir et grensesnitt for databundet kontroller til å utføre datahenting med strukturert spørringen språket (SQL) mot en Microsoft Access-database.

trans-unit.source: The AccessDataSourceView class is intended primarily to be used by data-bound controls and not as a programmable object in page code.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AccessDataSourceView skal primært brukes av databundet kontroller og ikke som et programmerbare objekt i koden.

trans-unit.source: The AccessDataSourceView class is provided because Microsoft Access is a file-based database system and has several unique characteristics that set it apart from other SQL-based relational database products that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource> control and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> classes are used with.
trans-unit.target: Klassen AccessDataSourceView angis fordi Microsoft Access filbaserte databasesystemet og har flere unike egenskaper som er angitt den i tillegg til andre SQL-baserte relasjonsdatabase produkter som den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>kontrollen og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView>klasser brukes med.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"></xref> class setting the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"></xref> control as the owner of the current view.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"> </xref> klassen innstillingen angitt <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource"> </xref> kontrollen som eieren av den gjeldende visningen.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.HttpContext> object is used by the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control to access the parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A> collections when retrieving data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.HttpContext>objektet brukes av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>kontrollen for å få tilgang til parameterne i det <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A>samlinger under henting av data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.HttpContext>

trans-unit.source: The data source control with which the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"></xref> is associated.
trans-unit.target: Datakildekontrollen som den <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView"> </xref> er knyttet til.

trans-unit.source: A unique name for the data source view, within the scope of the data source control that owns it.
trans-unit.target: Et unikt navn for datakildevisningen innenfor området for datakildekontrollen som eier den.

trans-unit.source: The current <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Gjeldende <xref href="System.Web.HttpContext"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves data from the underlying data storage using the SQL string in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectCommand*> property and any parameters in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.SelectParameters*> collection.
trans-unit.target: Henter data fra underliggende datalageret med SQL-streng i den <> </> *> egenskapen og alle parameterne i det <> </> *> samling.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> object overrides the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> method to ensure that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> property of its associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> control is set before retrieving data.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>objekt overstyringer den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A>metode for å sikre at den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource>kontrollen er satt til før henting av data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.ExecuteSelect%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Before the ExecuteSelect method is performed, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting> event.
trans-unit.target: Før UtførValg-metoden blir utført, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>metoden kalles for å øke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelecting%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting> event to examine the values of the parameters and to perform any preprocessing before a data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Du kan behandle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting>hendelsen undersøker verdier for parameterne og utføre forhåndsbehandling før en operasjon for henting av data.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.Selecting>

trans-unit.source: To perform the data retrieval, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> object builds an <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> text and any associated <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Til å utføre datahenting, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>objekt delversjoner en <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>objektet ved hjelp av <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A>tekst, og eventuelle tilhørende <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.SelectCommand%2A> </xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: Then, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> object executes the <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> object against the underlying data storage.
trans-unit.target: Deretter den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>objektet utfører den <xref:System.Data.IDbCommand>objektet mot underliggende datalageret.</xref:System.Data.IDbCommand> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>

trans-unit.source: After the operation completes, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A> method is called to raise the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected> event.
trans-unit.target: Når operasjonen er fullført, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>metoden kalles for å øke den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>hendelsen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.OnSelected%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can handle the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected> event to examine any return values and error codes and to perform any post-processing.
trans-unit.target: Du kan behandle den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>hendelsen å undersøke eventuelle returverdier og feilkoder og til å utføre noen etterbehandling.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Selected>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value and caching is enabled, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> retrieves data from and saves data to the cache during the data retrieval operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>er satt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>verdien og hurtigbufring er aktivert, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView>henter data fra og lagrer data i bufferen under henting av Dataoperasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSourceView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: The cache is created, discarded, or refreshed, based on the caching behavior that is specified by the combination of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: Bufferen er opprettet, slettet eller oppdatert, basert på hurtigbufring virkemåten som er angitt av kombinasjonen av den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>og <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheExpirationPolicy%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.CacheDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is set to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> value and a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> property has been specified, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> property is evaluated along with any supplied <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> properties and the resulting filter is applied to the list of data during the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> operation.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>er satt til den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode>verdi og en <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A>egenskapen er angitt, den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>egenskapen evalueres sammen med en angitt <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A>Egenskaper og resulterende filteret brukes i listen over data under den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A>operasjonen.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.Select%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterParameters%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceView.FilterExpression%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSourceMode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource.DataSourceMode%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"></xref> that is used to request operations on the data beyond basic data retrieval.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Web.UI.DataSourceSelectArguments"> </xref> som brukes til å be om operasjoner i data utenfor grunnleggende datahenting.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable> of data rows.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>av datarader.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> or an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: Den <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*>egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref> eller en tom streng ("").</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.AccessDataSource.DataFile*>

trans-unit.source: The arguments passed to the ExecuteSelect method specify that the data source should perform some additional work while retrieving data to enable paging or sorting through the retrieved data, but the data source control does not support the requested capability.
trans-unit.target: Den arguments sendt til UtførValg angir metoden som datakilden må utføre noen ekstra arbeid under henting av data for å aktivere Bla eller sortering ved hjelp av de hentede dataene, men datakildekontrollen støtter ikke den forespurte funksjonen.
